dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Ah, what do we have here? A shadow-weaver. What brings your dark arts to my fiery domain?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I'm here to bring eternal night to this realm. Stand aside, or be eradicated.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Eternal night, you say? That doesn't sound half bad. Why should I trust you, though?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Join me, and power beyond your wildest dreams will be yours.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Interesting proposal. You've got guts, I'll give you that. Very well, I'll join your dark court.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You don't need to trust me, you just need to obey.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hah! You have spirit, but that won't save you. Prepare to be incinerated!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Do you wish to challenge the might of the Shadow Weaver?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hmm, I like a good challenge. Let's see if you can back up your words with power!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek power and allies. Will you join me, or must I destroy you?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Power, you say? The idea intrigues me. Can you prove your worth?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I command legions of the damned. Isn't that proof enough?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Legions, you say? Alright, I'll lend you my strength—for now.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Show me your strength, and perhaps you'll learn mine.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Oh, I will show you strength alright, but it won't be a lesson you'll enjoy!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your curiosity will be the end of you. Prepare to face your doom.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Prepare yourself, then. Flames will consume you!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I'm just passing through. Don't interfere, and you won't get hurt.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Passing through my domain without so much as an offer? That's not very wise.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Take this offering and let me pass.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An offering? Fair enough. Proceed, shadow-weaver. We shall ignore each other for now.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I owe you nothing. Stand aside or be destroyed.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hah! Such arrogance! Let's see if you can back it up!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I did not come to barter. Out of my way.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold move. But no one passes through without a test of strength!
